title: What causes component positions to change when creating MM fonts?
content: When I create MM fonts in Fontlab, using Blend Fonts or Mask-to-Master components in the masters sometimes move into new positions. Am I doing something wrong, or is this a bug?
author: James Puckett

comments.content:
It happens all the time. It seems, it changes the coordinates between the components. This is definitely a bug.
